title: After the Storm : Book 1 of Kit and Shara
description: Two women find each other in a post apocalyptic world.Kit, a strong willed woman who has obligations to others and a strong will to survive will stop at nothing to get the ones she loves to safety. However, she is often haunted by her past.Shara, a quiet, gentle, talented healer find a hurt Kit outside her door. Her decision to help only brings about much harder decisions that have to be made.The two women find hope and love in each other, as they find themselves and their charges fighting their way across the city as they race to find a new home.
author: Diane  Thomas
